actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that any trust established for the payment of medical or dental malpractice claims and related expenses shall be tax exempt, and that a deduction shall be allowed for contributions to such a trust.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide that certain trusts established for the payment of medical or dental malpractice claims and related expenses shall be tax exempt, and that contributions to such trusts shall be tax deductible.

titles.title: A bill to amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1954 to provide that any trust established for the payment of medical or dental malpractice claims and related expenses shall be tax exempt, and that a deduction shall be allowed for contributions to such a trust.
